name: Bubbles Shot Free
description:
Increase your reflexes by blowing up Bubbles!
Beware, it goes faster and faster!
You must keep rythm ever increasing.
Stay alert!

The best score and the last score are recorded.
The Magic Bubble can sometimes save you by blowing up all Bubbles in one touch.

Share your score online and try to stay in the world ranking.
So, you can compete with players around the World!

Have Fun!

••• Game Features •••

• Optimized for iPhone5
• Graphics are very fun
• Develop your reflexes
• The difficulty ever increases
• Upload your Score and enter in the World Ranking
